definitions.text: an item of information that is typical of a class or group
examples: this patient provides a typical example of the syndrome
there is an example on page 10
he is the very model of a modern major general

definitions.text: punishment intended as a warning to others
examples: they decided to make an example of him
it was a case of bad judgment
but there is always the famous example of the Smiths

definitions.text: a task performed or problem solved in order to develop skill or understanding
examples: you must work the examples at the end of each chapter in the textbook
